title: RESOLUTION ADOPTING RESOLUTION NO. 2019-65, DATED OCTOBER 11, 2019 ENTITLED “A RESOLUTION ADOPTING THE NEW INTERNAL RULES OF PROCEDURES OF THE SANGGUNIANG BAYAN OF LOS BANOS.”  AND RESOLUTION NO. 2022-158, DATED OCTOBER 11,2022 ENTITLED “RESOLUTION APPROVING THE AMENDMENTS TO THE INTERNAL RULES OF PROCEDURES OF THE SANGGUNIANG BAYAN OF LOS BANOS”; SUBJECT TO AMENDMENT UPDATES OF THE NEW SANGGUNIANG BAYAN MEMBERS TO COME OUT WITHIN NINETY (90) DAYS AS PRESCRIBED BY THE LOCAL GOVERNMENT CODE OF 1991 (R.A. 7160).
